comment:
"Играется после 2 боя на арене
Несколько друкарей общаются при приближении игрока
Спикер 1"

languages.text: "Это он{mf||а}? Т{mf|от|а}, что прикончил{mf||а} Кровавых прозелитов?"
"Is that {mf|him|her}? The one who butchered the Bloodstained Proselytes?"
languages.original_text: "Это он{mf||а}? Т{mf|от|а}, что прикончил{mf||а} Кровавых прозелитов?"

traits.locale_text: "Is that {mf|him|her}? The one who butchered the Bloodstained Proselytes?"
"Is that {mf|him|her}? The one who butchered the Bloodstained Proselytes?"
"Is that {mf|him|her}? The one who butchered the Bloodstained Proselytes?"
"Is that {mf|him|her}? The one who butchered the Bloodstained Proselytes?"
"Is that {mf|him|her}? The one who butchered the Bloodstained Proselytes?"

languages.text: “就是{mf|他|她}吗？就是{mf|他|她}把那群血腥叛党杀光了吗？”
languages.original_text: "Is that {mf|him|her}? The one who butchered the Bloodstained Proselytes?"

traits.locale_text: “就是{mf|他|她}吗？就是{mf|他|她}把那群血腥叛党杀光了吗？”

languages.text: 「あれがそうなのか？『血まみれの改宗者』を虐殺したとかいうやつか？」
languages.original_text: "Is that {mf|him|her}? The one who butchered the Bloodstained Proselytes?"

traits.locale_text: 「あれがそうなのか？『血まみれの改宗者』を虐殺したとかいうやつか？」

languages.text: « C'est {mf|lui|elle} qui a massacré les Prosélytes sanglants ? »
languages.original_text: "Is that {mf|him|her}? The one who butchered the Bloodstained Proselytes?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est {mf|lui|elle} qui a massacré les Prosélytes Entachés de sang ? »

languages.text: «¿Es {mf|él|ella}? ¿{mf|El|La} que aniquiló a los Prosélitos Ensangrentados?».
languages.original_text: "Is that {mf|him|her}? The one who butchered the Bloodstained Proselytes?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Es {mf|él|ella}? ¿{mf|El|La} que aniquiló a los Prosélitos Ensangrentados?».

languages.text: "Ist {mf|er|sie} das? {mf|Der Kerl, der|Die Frau, die} die Blutbefleckten Proselyten abgeschlachtet hat?"
languages.original_text: "Is that {mf|him|her}? The one who butchered the Bloodstained Proselytes?"

traits.locale_text: "Ist {mf|er|sie} das? {mf|Der Kerl, der|Die Frau, die} die Blutbefleckten Proselyten abgeschlachtet hat?"

languages.original_text: "Is that {mf|him|her}? The one who butchered the Bloodstained Proselytes?"

traits.locale_text: "Şuradaki o mu? Kızıl Zındıkları haklamış, diyorlar."
